contentText.text: Carlos and David realize that they could make some handy cash doing jobs like this, so they decide to start a new side business. They start offering smaller Johnson Controls’ clients special discounts for their work. There’s a lot of work, which means their days are hectic, but the extra income is welcome.

popText.text: Someone makes an anonymous report to Johnson Controls, and an investigation is opened.
Carlos and David lose their jobs for stealing business opportunities from the company and using company resources for their own personal gain.
